cause.description:
LCHAD is a genetic disorder. It is where the body cannot digest long chain fatty acids. Normally you do not know that you have this until are in heart failure or in a coma. Both parents of a child born with this disorder must be carriers. For the parents to be carriers, both sets of parents must also be carriers, or may have this disorder. A person with this looks normal. But cannot hold engery, the only engery these people have is from the foods that they eat. They must be on special diets.
1. A cure needs to be found
2. promote screening
cause.name: LCHAD awareness
